mapper.select: select address1 from guesthouse where case when address1 < 'ㄱ' then upper(substr(address1, 1, 1)) when ascii('ㄱ') <= ascii(address1) and ascii(address1)<= ascii('ㅎ') then address1 when address1 < '나' then 'ㄱ' when address1 < '다' then 'ㄴ' when address1 < '라' then 'ㄷ' when address1 < '마' then 'ㄹ' when address1 < '바' then 'ㅁ' when address1 < '사' then 'ㅂ' when address1 < '아' then 'ㅅ' when address1 < '자' then 'ㅇ' when address1 < '차' then 'ㅈ' when address1 < '카' then 'ㅊ' when address1 < '타' then 'ㅋ' when address1 < '파' then 'ㅌ' when address1 < '하' then 'ㅍ' else 'ㅎ' end = upper(#{address1}) or address1 like '%'||#{address1}||'%'
